info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Garfield and northeastern Iron Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 629 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paragonah, or 22 miles northeast of Cedar City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parowan, Panguitch and Paragonah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 77 and 90. US Route 89 between mile markers 133 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
